title: Is an admin assistant job Halal during Christmas?  assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Adil from Hong Kong Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Sheikh I hope you're doing fine Alhamdulillah I have a question about the nature of my work I work as an admin assistant at a sports school So they gave sports training to young children Now at this time of the year as you know It's Christmas time for them So they are offering sports classes in camps In which you know they have some themed Christmas games Santa Claus and all of that So all I wanted to ask was Whether my work as an admin So basically what I do is Take enrollments, receive payments Answering any questions So during this period of the year This time Is my work Halal or That's my question No your work is Halal Inshallah I have no problem in doing that Alhamdulillah
